website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight baby and toddler scale that helps you track height as well as weight.
pros: Ruler included to measure baby's height
Converts to a regular scale when your child is able to stand
cons: Difficult to obtain an accurate reading when your baby is moving

customer_reviews.title: Very good scale for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to monitor my newborn as she is not gaining weight as quickly as she should be. I'm impressed with this scale for the price. I had a hospital nurse come to my home for a home visit and we compared this scale to her hospital-grade scale. It was only off by .01. It's accurate enough for her weighted feeds. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: amull4723

customer_reviews.title: perfect aid while i cant see the doctors as frequently due to corna-19
customer_reviews.text: love having this scale its made buying diapers and cloths for my baby sooooooooooo much easier. As well I can take my baby progress of growth when ever I want which has been very handy since the pediatrician keeps pushing my baby appointments back. wither you user a parent app like me, babybook or notebook. Logging my baby's weight and height has built my confident and comfort in peace of mind. Especially since my baby has acid reflux and on those day/nights were the baby spits-up,throw-up or vomits and i can see the baby is still gaining weight is important to know.
customer_reviews.author: Mermicorno

customer_reviews.title: Accurate weight
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for several weeks now and it always matches the doctors office weight for my infant and my toddler. Helps to make sure they are gaining consistency especially after sickness.
customer_reviews.author: Missbrandi

customer_reviews.title: Good Scale for Price
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this scale for a month to track our daughter's weight. It's a nice scale and has been accurate when compared to our doctor's scale. The only reason I'm knocking off a star is due to the confusion with the hold function. I'm including a picture of the instructions which say the hold function will take the AVERAGE weight for you, which is great if you have a wiggly baby. However, this is not the case. As the seller says on this page, the hold function simply stops the display from changing once you've determined what the weight is.
customer_reviews.author: L. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a nervous mommy who wants to ensure exclusively breast feed baby is on track. Brought relief ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate readings, great for NICU babies and monitoring weight gain in young children.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for when my NICU baby came home for reassurance that baby was continuing to gain weight. I was a little nervous about the 10g margin on error but this scale is surprisingly accurate! We brought it along to a weight check appointment and weighed baby on this scale, and then the pediatrician’s scale, and the readings were as stated 10g margin of error. Providers scale said 1960g this scale said 1970g. I feel confident using this scale at home to monitor baby’s growth. I would highly recommend this scale as an affordable alternative to other scales marketed towards parents with young children.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Pieratt

customer_reviews.title: great baby scale
customer_reviews.text: We got this scale because we were worried if our baby was gaining weight. This scale was reasonably priced. It seems to be fairly accurate since the values match the ones from the hospital visits. Values in grams seem to fluctuate a lot but it's manageable. We like to use it with the grams because the inclement is 10 g (approx 1/3 oz).
customer_reviews.author: Moominchoco

customer_reviews.title: should had it earlier
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Scale for both baby and adults! Very easy assemble, took me only 2 minutes to put everything together. I love that they also included battery, so i can use it right away. The scale is accurate and sensitive, I am able to weight my phone and other small projects. It is touch control. very simple to use. I should had it earlier. very happy purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rui

customer_reviews.title: Hard to read the scale with a wiggling baby as ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to read the scale with a wiggling baby as it changes reading so fast, but u do also appreciate that in a way. Needs an "average reading over 10 second interval" function maybe. The accuracy up to 10g is somewhat questionable, but it is close. Difficult for adult weights because display is upside down of you face it.
customer_reviews.author: drjps

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and sensitive, can be used for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Not only babies can use, but adults can also use this scale. So my wife is also using it when she is pregnant, and she checks her weight everyday. After our baby is born, it can be used not only during infancy, but I believe that it can be used with the growth of our baby. The accuracy of the scale is also accurate and sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Stopped being accurate after six months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for first six months, weighing baby about once a day. Then it stopped giving accurate results. I’ve replaced batteries, but still over 50% off. I’m very disappointed in quality. I expected better after spending nearly $60.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I read, and read, and read testimonials and was so excited to get this scale after others reviews. It just jumps all over the place. Even if someone is very, very still, it will not lock in on a number. I have not been able to use it a single time successfully. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Geyer

customer_reviews.title: Not very stable. Accurate on gross measurements, but not to the 10th.
customer_reviews.text: Tray arrives in two pieces that have to be put together and have a way of separating. It's very unstable on the scale and tips over easily. Use caution if setting a baby on it. I use it for a cat. His weight varies up to 3/10 of a pound depending on whether he's standing, sitting, or lying on the scale.
customer_reviews.author: WS

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: We compared this scale to the pediatrician’s and it is very accurate. We put a soft cloth on it when weighing baby and he doesn’t mind it at all. I especially like that it can double as an adult scale once we no longer need it for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Inc1982

customer_reviews.title: Precision is inaccurately described
customer_reviews.text: there is a round'ish to .5oz precision. on other scales i measured 1.4oz and this scale would round down to 1.0 so i would say it's precise to 14 grams. not 10.
customer_reviews.author: Sokratz

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: My first hint was that the box didn’t come with any instructions, however I was still willing to give the product a chance since it seemed pretty easy to assemble. Once it was however, the scale obviously didn’t work saying that my 6 week old baby is only 5.5 oz. (she just weight 8.2 at the pediatrician a couple days ago).
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Newman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to use but a small warning.....
customer_reviews.text: It's a scale, it does the job and is pretty easy to use. I have found out that if you have your cellphone near it, especially if the phone is charging, it goes wonky! so just beware of that!
customer_reviews.author: Camela

customer_reviews.title: Consistent with doctors office scale
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate, weight bounces around when the baby does but I've found it consistent with other scales from lactation consultants as well as the doctors office.
customer_reviews.author: mrharmon

customer_reviews.title: Always shows less than it is!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this scale. I looked around a lot to buy a good accurate scale and though this was it. Had great reviews and everything! But the scale is always off. If I weigh something 10 lbs it shows 7.6. If I weigh something 140 lbs it shows 131. For spending $60 I expected accuracy. Definitely returning this poor item.
customer_reviews.author: ROY T.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely accurate!
customer_reviews.text: I have weighed my baby before and after feeding him a 5 oz bottle, and it immediately shows the difference in weight right down to the very ounce. Highly recommend it, especially for parents concerned about their baby's weight gain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, fairly accurate scale. Helped ease my mind while breastfeeding my late preterm baby to make sure he was gaining enough weight in those first few weeks. If you’re a new mom and worried about your newborn’s weight gain, get this! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Bove

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great we purchased this for a puppy liter and it was a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Scale
customer_reviews.text: The scale is easy to use and read. Like that it has a "hold" button for when babies move around. Good price for being a baby, child, adult scale. Only downside is if adults weigh more then 220 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: this scale suits me well. It is good for me to monitor my weight when I am pregnant, and it also can use to monitor my baby's weight when the baby is born.Also, It has three different modes of unit to choose. It is a great scale.
customer_reviews.author: vivian

customer_reviews.title: Compact size
customer_reviews.text: This was sent overseas to a medical clinic that is part of our mission outreach. It was much appreciated and no complaints about how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Cee Tee

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully accurate
customer_reviews.text: Love this scale! 100% on par with the pediatricians office. I love that I have the options of weighing in either ounces, KG or LBS.
customer_reviews.author: Nagnot

customer_reviews.title: Too shaking. Not useful for babies
customer_reviews.text: Very shaking when trying to get a reading and isn’t accurate compared to the DRs scale. Nice for pets but not babies
customer_reviews.author: Elisha L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for since I wanted a scale I could use as well
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate with our Dr's scale
customer_reviews.text: This has been right on with our Doctor's scales. It's nice to be able to make sure your baby is gaining weight and I love that it will grow with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jami White

customer_reviews.title: Must weigh at least 20 g for the scale to react and it would be nice if it had a higher resolution than 10 g
customer_reviews.text: A newborn size diaper is too light to "zero " the scale. Must weigh at least 20 g for the scale to react and it would be nice if it had a higher resolution than 10 g.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: great gift for breast feeding babies. Can weigh down to 10gms or 1/3 of an ounce
customer_reviews.author: babyjewels

customer_reviews.title: Too jumpy, not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Way too sensitive. If baby wiggles at all the numbers are all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne S.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to track my daughter's weight and it seems to match accurately to her pediatrician's scale. Simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mika M. Pierson

customer_reviews.title: No good for moving baby
customer_reviews.text: Me and my wife got this to measure how much my infant was eating while breastfeeding. But it kind of defeats the purpose when its within 5 ounces different every weigh. It goes from 11 ounces up to 16 ounces without even removing my baby. Horrible item for a moving baby
customer_reviews.author: Devan Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: HOLD function does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The scale seems accurate, but only if your baby doesn't move at all. The HOLD function, which is supposed to take an average of the weights it reads while your baby moves around, simply takes whatever measurement was read when you hit the button...not helpful. As such, 2 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good scale
customer_reviews.text: Good scale to monitor a poor feeders weight gain at home and reduce anxiety of parents. Pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great - does what we need & has helped me range how much she’s getting while I’m still figuring out this whole breast feeding thing
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: I find it very accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this scale with my new born who was slow to gain weight while breast feeding at first. I find it very accurate and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: TSProsek

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate. I always recheck our baby when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate. I always recheck our baby when I get home from the Dr and it’s always right on.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Wood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry, and measurement accurate
customer_reviews.text: I brought this scale for my friend’s baby shower, he told me that he loves it, light weight easy to carry and measurement is accurate. He said that’s the best best gift he got from baby shower!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate and helped track my baby's weight gain progress.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: It’s not accurate when measuring your baby unless your baby will not move at all for a few seconds, which is almost impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale. I can follow up my princess weight almost everyday :)
customer_reviews.author: francisco zuluaga

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mom worried about baby weight gain slowly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for mom worried about baby weight gain slowly. Works great. Love the zero out feature which makes it simple !one time I weigh baby before going to our normal appointments and it was darn close to the doctor scale, when baby getting older,you can move the tray .this scale maximum is 220 lb . Very useful!
customer_reviews.author: Ying Yin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for early term baby
customer_reviews.text: My son was born early and I needed a way to watch his weight, and this was exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of box
customer_reviews.text: Display backlight did not operate. Have to use a flashlight to see the numbers till it is replaced.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy jewell

customer_reviews.title: Child with Rare Heart Defect Needs Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this purchase. We have an 8-month old daughter with a rare heart defect. She started to lose weight due to the effects of the defect. We have been put in a position where monitoring her rate of diminishment versus gains is very necessary in order to report post-surgery progress to her medical care. We have many appointments at the hospital where she is weighed. This scale has been found to be lacking anything nearly resembling accuracy. It has been almost half a pound inaccurate for the entire time we have owned it. We bought this scale on May 7 and within a month and a half it is unusable. We are very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Yurk

customer_reviews.title: This is great for weighing my kittens
customer_reviews.text: This is great for weighing my kittens! The top piece comes off and can be take apart to save space when storing this.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Not for weighted feeds
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale to do weighted feeds. If your baby moves this scale is useless. The hold button does not give an average. Pretty disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I wish I brought it earlier , it’s super convenience! Recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This is awful. I was excited to try it since it got good reviews but the numbers don’t stay, the keep fluctuating the entire time you are on scale even when you don’t move. Horrible. I have to send it back !
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I missed the return window! This is garbage. The number keep jumping even when there’s nothing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed & upset
customer_reviews.text: Not an accurate scale. I'd like to return for my money back but that doesn't seem to be an available option-???
customer_reviews.author: skeptic

customer_reviews.title: Great scale, looks nice too
customer_reviews.text: Accurate, can be taken apart to keep it compact very easily. Great way to check your weight and baby's with the same scale. Also has ruler right on it for length measurements.
customer_reviews.author: N. Fulling

customer_reviews.title: Good scale, measures accurately
customer_reviews.text: It works as it says. One thing to be aware of is the pounds doesn’t show ounces if that makes sense
customer_reviews.author: S. Holland

product_meta.title: Baby Scale Multi-Function Accurately Digital Baby Infant Toddler Scale with Height Tray Weight(Max:220lbs) and Height(Max:60cm) 2-in-1 Baby to Toddler Scale
feature_bullets: Unit KG / LB / OZ switchable; Hold function; Zero function.
Blue backlight display, ensure clearly measurement even in dark.
Suitable for newborn baby child adult and home using. 12months warranty.
Lock the scale on the bottom, put the scale on a flat and solid surface to ensure it will work properly.
